prospects.name: 8 x 200m
prospects.description:
Make sure you have a level track or field with distance markers and prepare yourself to open the throttle!

​

For help understanding your run workout and calculating your pace zones, please see [this article](https://wahoosystm.com/RunningSessionFAQ).

Learn how to perform your [**Running Drills**](https://support.wahoofitness.com/hc/en-us/articles/4404080091922-Running-Drills) here.

​

**Warm-Up**

10 minutes @ RPE 2-4 -- 145-120% of RTP -- HR 70-87% (Z1-Z2)

​

**Activation: Strides**

Number of Sets 5

Rest Between Sets 1 min

Interval Distance 50m build

Interval Effort Gradually increase from RPE 3-8 (Z2-Z4)

Recovery RPE <2 -->145% of RTP -- HR <70% (Z1)

​

**Main Effort**

Number of Sets 8

Rest Between Sets 1 minute

Interval Distance Per set 200m

Interval Effort RPE 9-10 --<85% of RTP --HR NA (Z5)

Recovery RPE 1-2 -->145% RTP --HR <70% (Z1)

Note: If necessary this can be split into 2 sets of 4 repeats, adding in 5-8 minutes of easy jogging between the 2 sets. The goal here is maximal speed for each and every effort!

​

**Extra Volume**

NA

​

**Cool Down**

5-10 minutes @ RPE 2 -- 145% of RTP -- HR <70% (Z1)

​

prospects.name: 2 sets 4 x 400s
prospects.description:
For help understanding your run workout and calculating your pace zones, please see [this article](https://wahoosystm.com/RunningSessionFAQ).

Learn how to perform your [**Running Drills**](https://support.wahoofitness.com/hc/en-us/articles/4404080091922-Running-Drills) here.

​

**Warm Up**

10 minutes @ RPE 2-4 -- 145-120% of RTP -- HR 70-87% (Z1-Z2)

​

**Activation: Strides**

Number of Sets: 4

Rest Between Sets: 1 min

Interval Distance: 50m build

Interval Effort: Gradually increase from RPE 3-8 (Z2-Z4)

Recovery: RPE <2 -->145% of RTP -- HR <70% (Z1)

​

**Main Effort**

Number of sets: 2

Rest between sets: 20 minutes @ RPE 2 -- 50% of FTP -- HR <70%

Interval repeats per set: 4

**Interval**

Work: 2 minutes @ RPE 9 -- 95-105%% of MAP (115-135% of FTP)

Rest: 2 minutes @ RPE 1.5 -- 45% of FTP-- HR <70%

​

**Main Effort**

Number of Sets: 2

Rest Between Sets: 7 minute

Interval repeats per set: 4

**Interval**

Interval Distance Per set: 400m

Recovery between Intervals: 1 minute

Interval Effort: RPE 8.5-9.5 --92-85% of RTP --HR 105% + (Z5)

Recovery: RPE 1-2 -->145% RTP --HR <70% (Z1)

​

**Extra Volume**

NA

​

**Cool Down**

5-10 minutes @ RPE 2 -- 145% of RTP -- HR <70% (Z1)

prospects.name: 03. Establishing the Goal Setting Habit
prospects.description:
**GOAL SETTING**

A clear plan of action is essential to any undertaking. Setting concrete, actionable goals will keep you motivated and on track; whether you’re eyeing the top podium step or the summit of the local climb. We will help assess where you are today, where you want to go, and identify the steps needed to get there.

​

In this module, you will enable consistent progress by creating a habit of identifying monthly and weekly goals, with weekly rewards for achieving those goals.

​

**GET THE WORKBOOK**

If you haven't yet, download the [Mental Training Workbook](https://drive.google.com/file/d/11VIC1ZmuIwDpmv9xdeUrZ6NJ_nZraqPv/view?usp=sharing).

It's a fillable PDF, but you can print it if you prefer to work from a hard copy.

​

​

​

​

​

​
